Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery wine-vessel (?), the fabric contains small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and faint traces of three lines of black-painted hieratic text beginning with a year-date but apparently not identifying contents.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393416) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393416)
